text: Gu Kraisan guma mbe, gu ana kaŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme fhum ana ndigap, won han Hevenan ndagim, 14 mpari vhɨzgi. Ana won fhava khɨgɨra ki o, ana wo fhava thav harigi khesharigi, gu kaŋgi fhuvara. Fhe Bakɨme nduara ne kaŋgi.12.2 Nza khaŋ muuŋgia kaŋgi, “Kraisan guma,” ana Por ra. Ndu ves 3 ganɨ ŋgɨp, 7 thɨgɨri.
